Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1979...
Traded from New York (N) to Pittsburgh on 2/5/1981 (Going to PIT: 1B K. Hrbek, RF V. Hayes, CF G. Redus, P B. Holton. Going to NYM: LF G. Matthews Sr., RF H. Kadota, P T. Johnson)...
Injured on 4/29/1981 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/1984, off Randy Jones (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/29/1984, off Luis Leal (HOU)...
Injured on 7/10/1985 with a Strained Calf Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
